item.description:
PLEASE NOTE LOCATION CHANGE to Novare Res, 4 Canal Plaza, Sutie 1, Portland.  To find us: enter and take your first left.

This month we're trying a less formal, more social meeting.    (We'll have a more tech-centered meetup soon) Please bring your latest published or in-progress apps and share.  I'm looking forward to hearing and seeing what you're up to. 

Food and beverage will flow throughout as per your desire (bring $$ for that).

Hoping to see you then, Brian
item.name: Talk iOS development: App Cream Social
